TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheItemRemovedReason extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the reason an item was removed from the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback> delegate to notify your ASP.NET applications when and why an object was removed from the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates a shared Boolean property, `itemRemoved`, a shared <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason> enumeration object, `reason`, and a <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback> delegate, `onRemove`. The latter can be included in an <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Insert%2A> or <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Add%2A> method call. It also defines a method, `RemovedCallback`, with a signature that matches the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedCallback> delegate. When the `RemovedCallback` method is called, it changes the `itemRemoved` property value to `true` and assigns the `reason` property value to the reason provided by the <xref:System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason> enumeration.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching Examples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/CS/cachecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching Examples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching Examples/VB/cachevb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason DependencyChanged = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The item is removed from the cache because the cache dependency associated with it changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason Expired = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The item is removed from the cache because it expired.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason Removed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The item is removed from the cache by a method call or by an method call that specified the same key.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Caching.CacheItemRemovedReason Underused = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The item is removed from the cache because the system removed it to free memory.
